description: Summertime is here, and you can't end it without a fabulous cocktail! Cantaloupe Seltzer Daiquiri is an exquisite beverage that you can enjoy with its beautiful color and divine taste.If you're a fan of the American sitcom,Friends, this cocktail will bring you back to when Susan tells Ross that Carol's milk tastes like "cantaloupe juice."
